languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс несколько секунд не может найти слов.{/n} "{name}... боль неизбежна. Постыдно страшиться ее". {n}После паузы он добавляет едва слышно.{/n} "Я никогда не слышал подобных слов. Спасибо".

traits.locale_text: {n}У Хейнрикса отвисает челюсть, несколько секунд он не может найти слов.{/n} "{name}... боль неизбежна. Постыдно страшиться ее". {n}Он снова умолкает на несколько мгновений и добавляет уже тише.{/n} "Я никогда не слышал подобных слов в свой адрес. Спасибо".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix is lost for words for several seconds.{/n} "{name}... pain is inevitable. It is shameful to dread it." {n}After a pause, he adds very quietly,{/n} "What you just said, no one has ever said anything like that to me before. Thank you."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс несколько секунд не может найти слов.{/n} "{name}... боль неизбежна. Постыдно страшиться ее". {n}После паузы он добавляет едва слышно.{/n} "Я никогда не слышал подобных слов. Спасибо".

{n}Heinrix is lost for words for several seconds.{/n} "{name}... pain is inevitable. It is shameful to dread it." {n}After a pause, he adds very quietly,{/n} "What you just said, no one has ever said anything like that to me before. Thank you."

{n}Heinrix is lost for words for several seconds.{/n} "{name}... pain is inevitable. It is shameful to dread it." {n}After a pause, he adds very quietly,{/n} "What you just said, no one has ever said anything like that to me before. Thank you."

languages.text: {n}海因里希愣了几秒钟，不知该说什么好。{/n}“{name}……痛苦是不可避免的，惧怕痛苦是可耻的行为。”{n}他顿了顿，随后低声补充道。{/n}“你刚刚那些话，以前从来没人对我说过。谢谢你。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is lost for words for several seconds.{/n} "{name}... pain is inevitable. It is shameful to dread it." {n}After a pause, he adds very quietly,{/n} "What you just said, no one has ever said anything like that to me before. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希愣了几秒钟，不知该说什么好。{/n}“{name}……痛苦是不可避免的，惧怕痛苦是可耻的行为。”{n}他顿了顿，随后低声补充道。{/n}“你刚刚那些话，以前从来没人对我说过。谢谢你。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix enmudece varios segundos.{/n} «{name}... el dolor es inevitable. Temerlo es una vergüenza». {n}Tras una breve pausa, añade en voz baja:{/n} «Nadie me había dicho nunca nada parecido. Muchas gracias».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is lost for words for several seconds.{/n} "{name}... pain is inevitable. It is shameful to dread it." {n}After a pause, he adds very quietly,{/n} "What you just said, no one has ever said anything like that to me before. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix enmudece varios segundos.{/n} «{name}... el dolor es inevitable. Temerlo es una vergüenza». {n}Tras una breve pausa, añade en voz baja:{/n} «Nadie me había dicho nunca nada parecido. Muchas gracias».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは、しばし絶句した。{/n}「{name}…痛みは避けられない。それを恐れるのは恥ずべきことだ」{n}しばらく間を置いてから、彼はとても静かにこう付け加えた。{/n}「あなたが今言ったようなことなど、これまで言われたことなかった。ありがとう」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is lost for words for several seconds.{/n} "{name}... pain is inevitable. It is shameful to dread it." {n}After a pause, he adds very quietly,{/n} "What you just said, no one has ever said anything like that to me before. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは、しばし絶句した。{/n}「{name}…痛みは避けられない。それを恐れるのは恥ずべきことだ」{n}しばらく間を置いてから、彼はとても静かにこう付け加えた。{/n}「あなたが今言ったようなことなど、これまで言われたことなかった。ありがとう」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix reste sans voix pendant un moment.{/n} « {name}... La souffrance est inévitable. Il n'y a aucun honneur à la redouter. » {n}Après une courte pause, il ajoute dans un murmure :{/n} « Ce que vous venez de dire... Personne ne m'avait jamais dit une chose pareille. Merci. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is lost for words for several seconds.{/n} "{name}... pain is inevitable. It is shameful to dread it." {n}After a pause, he adds very quietly,{/n} "What you just said, no one has ever said anything like that to me before. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix reste sans voix pendant un moment.{/n} « {name}... La souffrance est inévitable. Il n'y a aucun honneur à la redouter. » {n}Après une courte pause, il ajoute dans un murmure :{/n} « Ce que vous venez de dire... Personne ne m'avait jamais dit une chose pareille. Merci. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix ist für kurze Zeit sprachlos.{/n} "{name} ... Schmerz ist unvermeidbar. Es ist beschämend, ihn zu fürchten." {n}Kurz danach fügt er sehr leise an:{/n} "Was Ihr gerade gesagt habt, hat mir noch nie jemand zuvor gesagt. Danke."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is lost for words for several seconds.{/n} "{name}... pain is inevitable. It is shameful to dread it." {n}After a pause, he adds very quietly,{/n} "What you just said, no one has ever said anything like that to me before. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix ist für kurze Zeit sprachlos.{/n} "{name} ... Schmerz ist unvermeidbar. Es ist beschämend, ihn zu fürchten." {n}Kurz danach fügt er sehr leise an:{/n} "Was Ihr gerade gesagt habt, hat mir noch nie jemand zuvor gesagt. Danke."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, bir süre diyecek söz bulamıyor.{/n} "{name}... Acı kaçınılmazdır. Bundan çekinmek ise utanç vericidir." {n}Duraksamasının ardından kısık bir sesle devam ediyor.{/n} "Az önce söylediklerin... Daha önce hiç kimse bana böyle şeyler söylememişti. Teşekkür ederim."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is lost for words for several seconds.{/n} "{name}... pain is inevitable. It is shameful to dread it." {n}After a pause, he adds very quietly,{/n} "What you just said, no one has ever said anything like that to me before. Thank you."
